message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find very useful.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the product, $900,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it, which still leaves you a good profit margin. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to make an offer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. It's still a good deal for you, and it gets me closer to my desired price.
